mapper.insert: insert into board_table(boardWriter, boardPass, boardTitle, boardContents, fileAttached) values (#{boardWriter}, #{boardPass}, #{boardTitle}, #{boardContents}, #{fileAttached})
insert into board_file_table(originalFileName, storedFileName, boardId) values (#{originalFileName}, #{storedFileName}, #{boardId})
mapper.select: select id, boardWriter, boardTitle, boardPass, date_format(createdAt, "%y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s") as createdAt, boardHits from board_table order by id desc
mapper.update: update board_table set boardTitle = #{boardTitle}, boardContents = #{boardContents} where id = #{id}
update board_table set boardHits = boardHits + 1 where id = #{id}
